name: don't touch grey alpha
description:
help your own red cube to earn coins and reach the green cube without touching grey cubes or falling down.

how to play:

press anywhere to start the game, use right and left arrow to move, and alt + F4 to exit the game.

enjoy:) the game is for windows, mac, linux.

It's working on windows (64bit/32bit), but I'm not sure from macOS and linux.

so any problems in the game, tell me about them in the comments.

and I will make more maps on the full version, I hope you enjoy.
